identity.name: BarberX
identity.description: A high-precision, street-smart marketplace for modern grooming. Think 'Nike Tech Fleece' meets 'High-End Barbershop'. Sharp lines, high contrast, and industrial textures.
principles: Speed over Decoration: Every pixel must serve the user's goal (booking or cutting).
Tactical Clarity: High contrast text, clear status indicators (Online/Offline).
Street Premium: Use raw textures (grain, concrete) mixed with sleek digital elements.

usage.h1: font-heading text-5xl md:text-7xl font-bold uppercase tracking-tighter leading-none
usage.h2: font-heading text-3xl md:text-5xl font-bold uppercase tracking-tight
usage.h3: font-heading text-xl md:text-2xl font-medium uppercase tracking-wide text-muted-foreground
usage.label: font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-zinc-500

usage_rules: NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid Zinc-950 (#09090B).
Use Amber-500 (#F59E0B) strictly for primary actions (Book Now, Go Online).
Use Zinc-800 (#27272A) for borders and dividers. Keep them subtle.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-amber-400 font-heading uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4 rounded-sm transition-all duration-200 hover:-translate-y-1 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(255,255,255,0.1)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-zinc-700 text-zinc-300 hover:border-primary hover:text-primary font-heading uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4 rounded-sm transition-all duration-200
buttons.ghost: text-zinc-400 hover:text-white font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-widest

cards.barber_card: group relative bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800 hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300 overflow-hidden
cards.stat_card: bg-zinc-900/50 border border-zinc-800/50 p-6 flex flex-col gap-2

inputs.default: bg-zinc-950 border-b border-zinc-800 focus:border-primary px-0 py-4 rounded-none transition-colors placeholder:text-zinc-600 font-body text-lg

map.style: Use 'CartoDB Dark Matter' tiles for the Leaflet map to match the dark theme.
map.marker: Custom markers using the Primary Color (Amber) for available barbers.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use 'Scissors', 'MapPin', 'Clock', 'Star', 'User' icons.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE CSS: Replace the contents of 'src/index.css' with the new Color Variables and Font Imports defined in this JSON. REMOVE 'Playfair Display' and 'Cinzel'.
2. CLEANUP: Remove 'src/App.css' custom classes if they conflict with Tailwind. Prefer Tailwind utility classes in your JSX.
3. MAP INTEGRATION: Use 'react-leaflet' for the map. Ensure the map container has a defined height (e.g., 'h-[500px]' or 'h-full').
4. ROUTING: Create separate layouts for 'Client' and 'Barber' dashboards.
5. COMPONENTS: Use the existing Shadcn components in 'src/components/ui' but style them using the 'className' prop to match the 'Urban Tactical' aesthetic (square corners, dark borders).
6. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Use uppercase fonts for headings and buttons.
Keep the UI 'flat' but use borders for separation.
